languages.text: "Да какая от тебя может быть польза..." {n}Ксенос сонно зевает, непропорционально широко открывая пасть.{/n} "Впрочем, если хочешь услужить, у меня есть для тебя дело. Температуру в логове контролирует атмосферный конвектор. Мусорщик, который сбыл его мне, забыл сказать, что он неисправен. И, к его глубокому сожалению, он не смог его починить. Теперь обманщик мертв, а я претерпеваю дискомфорт".

"What use could you be to me...?" {n}The xenos yawns sleepily, his mouth opening disproportionately wide.{/n} "But if you want to serve, I have a task for you. The den's temperature is controlled by an atmospheric convector. The scavenger who sold it to me forgot to mention that it was faulty. Unfortunately for him, he was unable to repair it. Now the scavenger is dead, and I have to suffer the discomfort."
languages.original_text: "Да какая от тебя может быть польза..." {n}Ксенос сонно зевает, непропорционально широко открывая пасть.{/n} "Впрочем, если хочешь услужить, у меня есть для тебя дело. Температуру в логове контролирует атмосферный конвектор. Мусорщик, который сбыл его мне, забыл сказать, что он неисправен. И, к его глубокому сожалению, он не смог его починить. Теперь обманщик мертв, а я претерпеваю дискомфорт".

The den's temperature is controlled by an atmospheric convector. The scavenger who sold it to me forgot to mention that it was faulty. Unfortunately for him, he was unable to repair it. Now the scavenger is dead, and I have to suffer the discomfort."

traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: “你对我能有什么用……”{n}这个异形睡眼惺忪地打着呵欠，嘴巴张得特别大。{/n}“不过如果你愿意服务的话，我确实有个任务可以给你。这个巢穴的温度是由对流加热器控制的。这东西我是从拾荒者那里买来的。那个人忘了告诉我这个装置有问题，而且他运气不太好，修不好这玩意儿，于是他就没命了，而我则不得不忍受这样的不适。”
languages.original_text: "What use could you be to me...?" {n}The xenos yawns sleepily, his mouth opening disproportionately wide.{/n} "But if you want to serve, I have a task for you. The den's temperature is controlled by an atmospheric convector. The scavenger who sold it to me forgot to mention that it was faulty. Unfortunately for him, he was unable to repair it. Now the scavenger is dead, and I have to suffer the discomfort."

traits.locale_text: “你对我能有什么用……”{n}这个异形睡眼惺忪地打着呵欠，嘴巴张得特别大。{/n}“不过如果你愿意服务的话，我确实有个任务可以给你。这个巢穴的温度是由对流加热器控制的。这东西我是从拾荒者那里买来的。那个人忘了告诉我这个装置有问题，而且他运气不太好，修不好这玩意儿，于是他就没命了，而我则不得不忍受这样的不适。”
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: «¿Y de qué puedes servirme...?» {n}El xenos bosteza, adormilado, abriendo su boca de par en par.{/n} «Pero si quieres hacer algo por mí, tengo una tarea. La temperatura del local está controlada por un convector atmosférico. El carroñero que me lo vendió olvidó mencionar que estaba averiado y, por desgracia para él, no fue capaz de repararlo. Ahora está muerto y a mí me toca estar incómodo».
languages.original_text: "What use could you be to me...?" {n}The xenos yawns sleepily, his mouth opening disproportionately wide.{/n} "But if you want to serve, I have a task for you. The den's temperature is controlled by an atmospheric convector. The scavenger who sold it to me forgot to mention that it was faulty. Unfortunately for him, he was unable to repair it. Now the scavenger is dead, and I have to suffer the discomfort."

La temperatura del local está controlada por un convector atmosférico. El carroñero que me lo vendió olvidó mencionar que estaba averiado y, por desgracia para él, no fue capaz de repararlo. Ahora está muerto y a mí me toca estar incómodo».
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: 「貴様ごときは手を貸すなど…」{n}異種族は眠たそうにあくびをして、顎が外れるかのごとく大きなあくびをした。{/n}「しかし、そこまで言うならひとつ仕事を与えてやろう。我々の住まいの室温は対流式の温度調整器で制御されている。欠陥品であることを知らずに回収業者から買い取ってしまった。残念ながら、奴は修理できなかった。回収業者が死んでしまったことで、うすら寒い環境に耐えて暮らすはめになってしまった」
languages.original_text: "What use could you be to me...?" {n}The xenos yawns sleepily, his mouth opening disproportionately wide.{/n} "But if you want to serve, I have a task for you. The den's temperature is controlled by an atmospheric convector. The scavenger who sold it to me forgot to mention that it was faulty. Unfortunately for him, he was unable to repair it. Now the scavenger is dead, and I have to suffer the discomfort."

traits.locale_text: 「貴様ごときは手を貸すなど…」{n}異種族は眠たそうにあくびをして、顎が外れるかのごとく大きなあくびをした。{/n}「しかし、そこまで言うならひとつ仕事を与えてやろう。我々の住まいの室温は対流式の温度調整器で制御されている。欠陥品であることを知らずに回収業者から買い取ってしまった。残念ながら、奴は修理できなかった。回収業者が死んでしまったことで、うすら寒い環境に耐えて暮らすはめになってしまった」
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "Was solltet Ihr mir nutzen können ...?" {n}Der Xenos gähnt müde. Sein Mund öffnet sich unverhältnismäßig weit.{/n} "Doch wenn Ihr dienen wollt, habe ich eine Aufgabe für mich. Die Temperatur im Versteck wird von einem atmosphärischen Konvektor kontrolliert. Der Plünderer, der ihn mir verkauft hat, hat leider vergessen zu erwähnen, dass er defekt ist. Und leider — für ihn — war er nicht in der Lage, ihn zu reparieren. Nun ist der Plünderer tot und ich leide unter dem unangenehmen Klima."
languages.original_text: "What use could you be to me...?" {n}The xenos yawns sleepily, his mouth opening disproportionately wide.{/n} "But if you want to serve, I have a task for you. The den's temperature is controlled by an atmospheric convector. The scavenger who sold it to me forgot to mention that it was faulty. Unfortunately for him, he was unable to repair it. Now the scavenger is dead, and I have to suffer the discomfort."

traits.locale_text: "Was solltet Ihr mir nutzen können ...?" {n}Der Xenos gähnt müde. Sein Mund öffnet sich unverhältnismäßig weit.{/n} "Doch wenn Ihr dienen wollt, habe ich eine Aufgabe für mich. Die Temperatur im Versteck wird von einem atmosphärischen Konvektor kontrolliert. Der Plünderer, der ihn mir verkauft hat, hat leider vergessen zu erwähnen, dass er defekt ist. Und leider — für ihn — war er nicht in der Lage, ihn zu reparieren. Nun ist der Plünderer tot und ich leide unter dem unangenehmen Klima."
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: {n}Un bâillement de fatigue étire la bouche du xénos bien plus que vous ne l'auriez cru possible.{/n} « Qu'est-ce que vous pourriez bien faire pour moi ? Enfin, si vous voulez vous rendre utile, j'ai une mission pour vous. La température de l'antre est contrôlée par un convecteur atmosphérique, mais le pillard qui me l'a vendu a oublié de préciser qu'il était défectueux. Malheureusement pour lui, il n'a pas réussi à le réparer et non seulement il est mort, mais je dois en plus supporter le froid. »
languages.original_text: "What use could you be to me...?" {n}The xenos yawns sleepily, his mouth opening disproportionately wide.{/n} "But if you want to serve, I have a task for you. The den's temperature is controlled by an atmospheric convector. The scavenger who sold it to me forgot to mention that it was faulty. Unfortunately for him, he was unable to repair it. Now the scavenger is dead, and I have to suffer the discomfort."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un bâillement de fatigue étire la bouche du xénos bien plus que vous ne l'auriez cru possible.{/n} « Qu'est-ce que vous pourriez bien faire pour moi ? Enfin, si vous voulez vous rendre utile, j'ai une mission pour vous. La température de l'antre est contrôlée par un convecteur atmosphérique, mais le pillard qui me l'a vendu a oublié de préciser qu'il était défectueux. Malheureusement pour lui, il n'a pas réussi à le réparer et non seulement il est mort, mais je dois en plus supporter le froid. »
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "Ne işime yararsın ki sen?.." {n}Zeno, ağzını şaşılacak kadar genişçe açarak uykulu uykulu esniyor.{/n} "Gerçi hizmet etmek istiyorsan sana bir vazife verebilirim. İnimin sıcaklığını atmosferik bağlayıcıyla ayarlıyoruz. Bağlayıcıyı aldığım hurdacı, aletin bozuk olduğunu benden gizlemiş. Ne yazık ki tamir edemedi. Hurdacı geberip gitti, ben de canımın sıkıldığıyla kaldım."
languages.original_text: "What use could you be to me...?" {n}The xenos yawns sleepily, his mouth opening disproportionately wide.{/n} "But if you want to serve, I have a task for you. The den's temperature is controlled by an atmospheric convector. The scavenger who sold it to me forgot to mention that it was faulty. Unfortunately for him, he was unable to repair it. Now the scavenger is dead, and I have to suffer the discomfort."

traits.locale_text: "Ne işime yararsın ki sen?.." {n}Zeno, ağzını şaşılacak kadar genişçe açarak uykulu uykulu esniyor.{/n} "Gerçi hizmet etmek istiyorsan sana bir vazife verebilirim. Mekânın sıcaklığını atmosferik bir bağlayıcıyla ayarlıyoruz. Bağlayıcıyı aldığım hurdacı, aletin bozuk olduğunu benden gizlemiş. Ne yazık ki tamir edemedi, kendi adına üzücü bir durum. Hurdacı geberip gitti, ben de canımın sıkıldığıyla kaldım."
traits.speaker: Anger
